评论概述: 1yr later, still the best sweatshirts ever!
评论详情: I bought one for a trip to Chicago in Jan last year during that insane super freeze blizzard... I'm from SoCal and have health conditions that make me very sensitive to cold for perspective sake. I'm a big shivering wimp at anything under 70*F basically, -6* was way out of my comfort zone! 🥶 This was so warm and comfy and literally made the trip bearable. They are thick enough that a cold wind doesn't really go through the fabric too. Loved them so much I bought 2 more when I got home. I've had them for a year now and they've held up fantastically. Regularly machine wash them on warm water heavy cycles with everything else and dry on high heat. No shrinkage, no fading, no piling, and the lining is as soft and fluffy as the day I bought them. The drawstring on the hood is extra wide and nearly impossible to slide through the grommets so I've never lost a drawstring on these either. For a simple, solid, hoodie I actually am surprised at how often I get complimented on them (the quality is obvious) and people can't believe it when I tell them they're only $25-30. My kids are always trying to steal them. For the price I'm extremely impressed and highly recommend these! They run true to size (I'm 5"4' 140lbs and got size M, maybe go up a size if you like a much looser fit or want to layer a lot under). Get them in as many colors as you can afford!

Also, it came shrink-wrapped, which caused it to be very wrinkled, so I’m going to have to figure out how to get the wrinkles out before I wrap it as a gift
